attributes.action: Dr Ian Roberts should be included in the new year's honours list
attributes.background: Dr Ian Roberts ran into a fireball to save driver Romain Grosjean with no hesitation, he ran into a situation that was hugely dangerous and his only thought was that he wanted to save the driver, Dr Roberts is a hero.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour.

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here: https://www.gov.uk/honours.
